item.title: Leaf Clearance, 15th December
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 14/12/25 22:35 Street Cleansing - Sweeping Lat/Long - 51.434527, 0.0381866 what3words - mercy.mile.dock Nearest address - 38 Grove Park Road, Mottingham, London, SE9 4QA The leaves are turning into slime with the wet weather. The pavement will become more slippery and a hazard to pedestrians. In the gutter they will block the drains as they usually do. Please can you clear the leaves before these issues occur. The trees are bare now so no more leaves will fall so a great time for a final clear up to avoid further problems. Reference - 5185322 Map link - open Google map Report history - Status: Received 14/12/2025 22:34 The leaves are turning into slime with the wet weather. The pavement will become more slippery and a hazard to pedestrians. In the gutter they will block the drains as they usually do. Please can you clear the leaves before these issues occur. The trees are bare now so no more leaves will fall so a great time for a final clear up to avoid further problems.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Grove Park Road, Mottingham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A metre wide hole in the pavement, 15th December
item.description:
This pothole has been getting worse in the pavement over the last 2- 3 years and is now around a metre long and at least 150mm deep in places. It is located right outside our house where we have two young children and where all the Cleeve Park school children walk so it absolutely poses a trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 113, Bexley Lane, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
